languages.text: {n}Богопротивный ксеноразум свершил надругательство над принципами аугментации плоти. Чем дольше вы взираете на металл, встроенный в тело чудовища, тем громче протестует ваш разум против идеи постижения и понимания сей скверны.{/n}

{n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Богопротивный ксеноразум свершил надругательство над принципами аугментации плоти. Чем дольше вы взираете на металл, встроенный в тело чудовища, тем громче протестует ваш разум против идеи постижения и понимания сей скверны.{/n}

{n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族の冒涜的な思考は、身体拡張の原理そのものを汚した。怪物の肉体に埋め込まれた金属を見れば見るほど、あなたの心はこの汚らわしさを理解しようとする考えへの反発が大きくなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の冒涜的な思考は、身体拡張の原理そのものを汚した。怪物の肉体に埋め込まれた金属を見れば見るほど、あなたの心はこの汚らわしさを理解しようとする考えへの反発が大きくなる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}异形的邪恶科技已经完全违反了植入物的一切基本原则。你死死地盯着嵌在怪物血肉中的金属，你感觉看得越久，你的头脑就越是强烈地拒绝眼前的一切，不愿理解这种亵渎的设计。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异形的邪恶科技已经完全违反了植入物的一切基本原则。你死死地盯着嵌在怪物血肉中的金属，你感觉看得越久，你的头脑就越是强烈地拒绝眼前的一切，不愿理解这种亵渎的设计。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mente profana de los xenos ha profanado incluso los principios de los aumentos corporales. Cuanto más te fijas en el metal que atraviesa la carne del monstruo, más rechaza tu mente el comprender esa abominación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mente profana de los xenos ha profanado incluso los principios de los aumentos corporales. Cuanto más te fijas en el metal que atraviesa la carne del monstruo, más se niega tu mente a comprender esa abominación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der profane Verstand des Xenos hat die grundlegenden Prinzipien der Körperaugmentation geschändet. Je länger du dir das Metall ansiehst, das in das Fleisch des Monsters eingesetzt wurde, desto lauter rebelliert dein Verstand gegen den Gedanken, dieses schändliche Gebilde begreifen und verstehen zu sollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der profane Verstand des Xenos hat die grundlegenden Prinzipien der Körperaugmentation geschändet. Je länger du dir das Metall ansiehst, das in das Fleisch des Monsters eingesetzt wurde, desto lauter rebelliert dein Verstand gegen den Gedanken, dieses schändliche Gebilde begreifen und verstehen zu sollen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'esprit tordu du xénos a complètement détourné les principes mêmes de l'augmentation corporelle. Plus vous examinez les pièces de métal incrustées dans la chair du monstre, plus votre esprit rejette l'idée même de comprendre cette infamie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'esprit tordu du xénos a complètement détourné les principes mêmes de l'augmentation corporelle. Plus vous examinez les pièces de métal incrustées dans la chair du monstre, plus votre esprit rejette l'idée même de comprendre cette infamie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenonun kâfirlere yaraşır zihni, bedensel ogmentasyonların tüm prensiplerini lekeliyor. Canavarın metal gömülü etine baktıkça bu iğrençliği kavrama fikrine karşı zihninde daha da gürültülü bir isyan yükseliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The profane mind of the xenos has defiled the very principles of body augmentation. The longer you look at the metal embedded in the monster's flesh, the louder your mind rebels against the idea of comprehending and understanding this foulness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun kâfirlere yaraşır zihni, bedensel ogmentasyonların tüm prensiplerini lekeliyor. Canavarın metal gömülü etine ne kadar uzun bakarsan bu iğrençliği kavrama fikrine karşı zihninde daha da gürültülü bir isyan yükseliyor.{/n}
